LanguageData.Campfire.label: campfire
LanguageData.Campfire.description: A campfire that can cook meals and produce heat, but it will burn out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat.
LanguageData.Campfire_Blueprint.label: campfire (blueprint)
LanguageData.Campfire_Frame.label: campfire (building)
LanguageData.Campfire_Frame.description: A campfire that can cook meals and produce heat, but it will burn out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat.
LanguageData.Building_Heater.label: 烤炉
LanguageData.Building_Heater.description: A stove that produces heat by burning basic fuel sources. Can be fueled by kindling, coal, charcoal, peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Blueprint.label: 烤炉 (蓝图)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.label: 烤炉 (建造中)
LanguageData.Building_Heater_Frame.description: A stove that produces heat by burning basic fuel sources. Can be fueled by kindling, coal, charcoal, peat and wooden stuff.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.label: 电加热地板
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor.description: Heated flooring tiles that utilize conductive wires and convection heating to warm a room.
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Blueprint.label: 电加热地板 (蓝图)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.label: 电加热地板 (建造中)
LanguageData.EHeatedFloor_Frame.description: Heated flooring tiles that utilize conductive wires and convection heating to warm a room.
LanguageData.Heater.label: heater
LanguageData.Heater.description: An electrical device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.Heater_Blueprint.label: heater (blueprint)
LanguageData.Heater_Frame.label: heater (building)
LanguageData.Heater_Frame.description: An electrical device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.RH_MediumHeater.label: Medium heater
LanguageData.RH_MediumHeater.description: A wall mounted heater which is more efficient at heating large rooms and bases. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.RH_MediumHeater_Blueprint.label: Medium heater (blueprint)
LanguageData.RH_MediumHeater_Frame.label: Medium heater (building)
LanguageData.RH_MediumHeater_Frame.description: A wall mounted heater which is more efficient at heating large rooms and bases. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialHeater.label: Industrial heater
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialHeater.description: A massive industrial heater. It can efficiently heat large rooms and bases. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialHeater_Frame.label: Industrial heater (building)
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialHeater_Frame.descri: A massive industrial heater. It can efficiently heat large rooms and bases. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
LanguageData.GH.label: 地热加热器
LanguageData.GH.description: A industrial geothermal heater that collects and controls the heat from a steam geyser. It is self-balanced and can heat up a large indoor area to a comfortable temperature.
LanguageData.GH_Blueprint.label: 地热加热器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.label: 地热加热器 (建造中)
LanguageData.GH_Frame.description: A industrial geothermal heater that collects and controls the heat from a steam geyser. It is self-balanced and can heat up a large indoor area to a comfortable temperature.
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. While it's not strong enough to refridgerate food, it can help survive a heat wave. It will run out and self-destruct after several days.
LanguageData.PassiveCooler_Blueprint.label: passive cooler (blueprint)
LanguageData.PassiveCooler_Frame.label: passive cooler (building)
LanguageData.PassiveCooler_Frame.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. While it's not strong enough to refridgerate food, it can help survive a heat wave. It will run out and self-destruct after several days.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.label: 冰石制冷器
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery.description: A tank built to cool a medium-sized room to below freezing. Requires coldstone as fuel. Able to support a roof.
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Blueprint.label: 冰石制冷器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.label: 冰石制冷器 (建造中)
LanguageData.ColdstoneBattery_Frame.description: A tank built to cool a medium-sized room to below freezing. Requires coldstone as fuel. Able to support a roof.
LanguageData.RH_SmallCooler.label: Small cooler
LanguageData.RH_SmallCooler.description: An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.RH_SmallCooler_Blueprint.label: Small cooler (blueprint)
LanguageData.RH_SmallCooler_Frame.label: Small cooler (building)
LanguageData.RH_SmallCooler_Frame.description: An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.Cooler.label: cooler
LanguageData.Cooler.description: An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms during the summer months, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.Cooler_Blueprint.label: cooler (blueprint)
LanguageData.Cooler_Frame.label: cooler (building)
LanguageData.Cooler_Frame.description: An electrical device that fits into a wall and pushes cold air into a room. Its exhaust port generates a lot of heat. Can be used to cool down rooms during the summer months, or to create a walk-in freezer.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialCooler.label: Industrial cooler
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialCooler.description: A massive electrical device that pushes cold air into a room. It needs at least one external exhaust port.
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialCooler_Frame.label: Industrial cooler (building)
LanguageData.RedistHeat_IndustrialCooler_Frame.descri: A massive electrical device that pushes cold air into a room. It needs at least one external exhaust port.
LanguageData.Vent.label: closable vent
LanguageData.Vent.description: A simple vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
LanguageData.Vent_Blueprint.label: closable vent (blueprint)
LanguageData.Vent_Frame.label: closable vent (building)
LanguageData.Vent_Frame.description: A simple vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.label: 温度计
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge.description: Displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. Does not require power.
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint.label: 温度计 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Blueprint_Install.label: 温度计 (蓝图)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.label: 温度计 (建造中)
LanguageData.TemperatureGauge_Frame.description: Displays the current ambient temperature and can be configured to provide temperature based alerts. Does not require power.
LanguageData.MiningHelmetGlower.label: 矿盔灯
